original_text: Who serves as a soldier at his own expense? Who plants a vineyard without eating any of its fruit? Or who tends a flock without getting some of the milk?
korean_text: 누가 자기 비용으로 군 복무를 하겠느냐 누가 포도를 심고 그 열매를 먹지 않겠느냐 누가 양 떼를 기르고 그 양 떼의 젖을 먹지 않겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Who serves as a soldier at his own expense?
Who plants a vineyard without eating any of its fruit?
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 그 열매를 먹지 않고 포도원을 심습니까?

sentences.original_text: Or who tends a flock without getting some of the milk?
sentences.korean_translation: 또 누가 그 양떼의 젖을 조금도 얻지 못하고 양떼를 돌봅니까?
